# styleMedia

**Instance Property**

The style media object you use to make CSS media queries.

## Declaration

```swift
readonly attribute StyleMedia styleMedia;
```

## Discussion

Read [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/webkitjs/stylemedia] for details.
